proposal1.heroHeadline: KBD is losing 100 hours a year drafting proposals. Here's the breakdown.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Manually crafting proposals for marketing services takes hours. Automate this with a 47-second AI generation.
proposal1.problemsIntro: Below are the ongoing losses KBD faces with their current proposal process.

problems.title: Time Drain
problems.description: Each proposal takes 5 hours to complete. This is time not spent strategizing client campaigns, directly impacting revenue.

problems.title: Client Delays
problems.description: Delays in sending proposals cost KBD potential clients. Every day lost is a chance for a competitor to step in.

problems.title: Brand Inconsistency
problems.description: Manually creating proposals risks inconsistencies in branding. This can weaken KBD's professional image, costing credibility.

problems.title: Stress and Burnout
problems.description: Kevin and his partner are stretched thin. Constant pressure to produce perfect proposals can lead to burnout, reducing efficiency.

problems.title: Missed Opportunities
problems.description: Every hour spent on proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This leads to a direct loss in potential revenue.

problems.title: Increased Overheads
problems.description: Time-intensive proposal processes increase operational costs. These are resources that could be better spent on growth initiatives.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI automation system replaces these losses with efficiency and precision.

solutions.title: Instant Proposal Generation
solutions.description: Currently, proposals take hours to draft. With this system, get a complete, client-ready proposal in under 60 seconds.

solutions.title: Consistent Branding
solutions.description: Manual creation risks brand inconsistency. Our system ensures every proposal aligns with KBD's professional image.

solutions.title: Real-time Tracking
solutions.description: Currently, tracking proposal progress is manual. The system includes tracking to see when and how clients interact with proposals.

solutions.title: AI Chatbot Support
solutions.description: Client queries are handled manually, slowing response time. The AI chatbot addresses questions instantly, enhancing client interaction.

solutions.title: Resource Reallocation
solutions.description: Currently, resources are tied up in proposal drafting. Free up time and focus on closing deals and client strategy instead.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for KBD's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for KBD around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for KBD.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Drive Acme Corp's Growth with KBD's Proven Marketing Strategies
proposal2.heroSubheadline: Our tailored engagement plan focuses on converting visitors into loyal customers, maximizing your ROI.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Acme Corp is currently losing potential revenue due to several critical issues.

problems.title: Low Website Conversion
problems.description: Every visitor who leaves your site without converting is revenue walking out the door. Current conversion rates are below industry standard by 15%.

problems.title: Ineffective Ad Spend
problems.description: Without targeted ad strategies, your marketing dollars are not generating maximum returns. You're losing up to 20% ROI monthly.

problems.title: Poor Brand Visibility
problems.description: Low brand recognition means missed opportunities in capturing market share. Your competitors lead by 25% in brand recall.

problems.title: Underperforming Social Media
problems.description: Inconsistently managed social channels lead to disengagement. Social media drives only 5% of your overall traffic.

problems.title: Weak Customer Retention
problems.description: Lack of retention strategies results in losing repeat business. Customer churn rate is 10% higher than the industry average.

problems.title: Suboptimal Email Campaigns
problems.description: Ineffective email marketing is not converting leads. Open rates are 30% lower than expected benchmarks.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Our strategic solutions directly address these losses, turning them into opportunities.

solutions.title: Website Optimization
solutions.description: Enhance user experience and increase conversion rates through strategic redesigns and A/B testing.

solutions.title: Targeted Ad Campaigns
solutions.description: Maximize ROI with carefully crafted ad strategies tailored to your audience's needs.

solutions.title: SEO & Brand Building
solutions.description: Boost your online presence and improve brand recall with our expert SEO and branding services.

solutions.title: Email Marketing
solutions.description: Craft compelling campaigns that increase open rates and convert leads effectively.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: KBD is equipped with the expertise and experience to drive Acme Corp's success.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Expertise
whyUsCards.description: Our team has a track record of delivering measurable results for diverse clients.

whyUsCards.title: Client-Centric Approach
whyUsCards.description: We prioritize your needs and create strategies that align with your goals.

whyUsCards.title: Data-Driven Decisions
whyUsCards.description: Every recommendation is backed by data and analytics to ensure success.

whyUsCards.title: Comprehensive Solutions
whyUsCards.description: From strategy to execution, we offer a full suite of marketing services.

proposal2.teamIntro: Meet the leadership team driving our successful strategies.

team.name: Kevin Brown
team.bio: Kevin leads strategy and client relationships with a focus on delivering impactful marketing solutions.

process.title: Discovery & Planning
process.description: We assess your current position and set strategic goals.

process.title: Strategy Development
process.description: Our team crafts a strategy focused on your unique needs.

process.title: Implementation
process.description: Execute the plan with precision and agility.

process.title: Review & Adjust
process.description: Analyze results and refine strategies for continued growth.
